A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
OK. I really don't know where to start\, from the superman Leia to the addition of Rose to the cast\, this movie is terrible. It felt like a last minute project put together by someone who barely understood the material. It pains me to say I disliked this movie so much I created an account here for the first time in years of visiting just so I could post this.
Things that are missing/wrong that I think most people would agree with:
- How can Rei use the force so easily with no training?
- Who are Rei's parents? (for real\, if its actually people of no importance I'm done)
- Who is Snoke?
- Where did Kylo get his Kyber Crystal?
- Why the addition of Rose to the cast? And why even the kiss at the end with Finn?
- Why the weird sexual tension between Kylo and Rei?
- What even are Rei's motivations to stay with the resistance?

Things I hated:
- Superman Leia
- Light Speed ship as weapon (why not use the other ships you sacrificed instead??)
- Addition of Rose to the cast
- Casino Storyline
- Shortest fight ever with Captain Phasma
- Story started and ended in the same place really
- Bad\, bad jokes.

Its basically a dumbed-down version of Star Wars The Empire Strikes Back\, a glorified remake for the general public. Could've been so much more\, I even enjoyed the first one. This director is not very talented\, or maybe he didn't know the material as much as he thought he did. 

Either way\, Terrible. 0.5/5\, and the 0.5 is for the special effects those were on point.
